Perceptor::

"What're your skills, skulletron?"replied Perceptor





--- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> Skulletron grinned and looked at them.
> 
> "The name's Skulletron.  I belong to no faction right now.  I was 
hoping to
> join one as soon as possible.  Perhaps you could help me out with 
that?" he
> explained.
> 
> -------Original Message-------

>

> your faction???"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "LurkerAbyss" <1641coburn@r...> wrote:
> > After recieving no response from anybody inside the  Predacon 
base, 
> he assumed they were either busy or gone.  He started to walk away, 
> when his long-range scanners picked up two bots in the distance
> (Wolfenstein and Perceptor).  He waited for the two bots to come 
into 
> sight, so he would have a chance to actually talk to others in this 
> strange, new world...
